content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am very interested in negotiating the rental price with you. May I know how much you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I appreciate your offer of 500 Euros per month. However, I am looking for a higher rental price. May I suggest 600 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I look forward to working with you as a landlord. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
